divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were playing basketball in a parking lot, when one of my friends saw something in the sky. At first sight, it just looked like fireworks. There were about 50-75 spherical objects flying around each other in the sky. They were completely silent. They would swarm in and out of each other, and then they made a formation that looked like a bow tie. They stayed in the formation of a bow tie for about 15 seconds, and then they swarmed in and out of each other again. While they were flying around each other, they were slowly making their way northwest. They were very agile, and they were having no trouble cutting in any direction instantly. Eventually they stopped moving northwest, and they just started to slowly go higher up, until we couldn't see them anymore.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lansdale
There were no other sightings in Lansdale on or around March 23rd 2008
